data.eml:eml: Redescription of ' Polyzonium ' malagassum, a new synonym of Rhinotus purpureus (Pocock, 1894), with notes about the occurrence of the order Polyzoniida on Madagascar (Diplopoda)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wesener, Thomas (2014): Redescription of ' Polyzonium ' malagassum, a new synonym of Rhinotus purpureus (Pocock, 1894), with notes about the occurrence of the order Polyzoniida on Madagascar (Diplopoda). Zootaxa 3790 (4): 587-594, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3790.4.7
